title: 怎么把创造存档改成生存？

replies.author: Herobrine
replies.txt_content: 在创建存档时要开启作弊选项，游戏中打开会话，输入/gamemode 1来便创造，/gamemode 0变生存 gamemode和0之间有空格，命令前面加/。/gamemode 2是冒险模式。

replies.author: mc.wuge
replies.txt_content: 你打/gamemode 0就可以了哦！！求关注，求重用

replies.author: zhanshen:dragon
replies.txt_content: 用TMI修改器，或者/gamemode 0是生存/gamemode 1是创造/gamemode 2是冒险

replies.author: nqcwxp
replies.txt_content:
nqcwxp 发表于 2014-5-10 00:51
输入命令：/gamemode 1
打错了，/gamemode 0
